title: tfw boosters are rampant, and Riot will never do a thing about it.
body:
last match a yasuo goes 15/1... okay, so that is one thing, anyone could say he got fed and just carried... but if you OP.GG him, the account has 259 wins, 288 losses. if you look at most played, yasuo doesn't show up until you see a 100%, 4 wins with 315 cs avg and a really high kda. you look further and see zed, fizz and nidalee (and wukong) all with the same exact thing... then you look at the other champs most played and his most played  is 87 games with rengar with a 44% winrate and a normalish kda. IDK about you, but if you can play all those other champs at such a high skill, why is rengar your most played and least successful?

Riot. why can't you see this? why can't you take action against it? it defeats the purpose of even playing and the issue will only get worse.

tbh i might have even been kept out of gold simply because of all these boosters. I refuse to pay to earn my rank, but that doesn't mean I should have to in order to climb. 

could you imagine how much higher your actual ranking would be if elo-boosting wasn't a thing? 

anyway /rant, I just thought i'd throw my 2 cents in after seeing the same shit play over and over. booster carries team while destroying honest players.
